channel.title: FizzerX [Project Insanity]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hj67VBR.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Special Thanks To: MoparScape.org Keith The AWESOME MoparScape Community Everyone who played/supported FizzerX-Scape V1! [/b][/center]
[center][b]Developers: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jha1z1g.jpg[/img][b]Mod Cody[/b] - Game Developer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jha1z1g.jpg[/img][b]Mod Skyler[/b] - Assistant to Game Developer[/center]
FizzerX Official 2014 Trailor: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B-wOCMGt9s4
[center]Media: [spoiler][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vYN6b2g.png[/img] Quick Chat [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8a9JF0q.png[/img] PK Points Shop [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hGLHZqd.png[/img] Player Vs Player Zones Lumbridge [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GAwedDc.png[/img] Falador [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Gg1xjIa.png[/img] Camelot [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yKP6jPl.png[/img] Working Clanchat [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pgvOvCX.png[/img] Donator Shop [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WPvjYwE.png[/img] Dueling Arena [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dusFDd5.png[/img] Godwars Dungeon [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Hx4GEq0.png[/img] King Black Dragon [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9PUTGQs.png[/img] Pest Control [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PaKWweZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Vw7Fx1W.png[/img] Troll Stronghold [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vEA9iFJ.png[/img] Tzhaar [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2dTqgZs.png[/img][/spoiler][/center]
More information and media coming soon!
Click to find out why FizzerX is now a PI base! [spoiler]Some of you might notice that FizzerX changed a lot. It started out as an Allstar. We are now a PI base. The reason behind that it that I was hacked a few days ago, and the hacker put a password on my FizzerX Source. The hacker has been taken care of. I have contacted the law enforcement, and got the problem solved. I tried doing everything I can to back up my source. There were 2 copies of the source. Mine, and the one Keith (a developer) had. The hacker threatened to release it to Mopar and other communities. So for that reason, and because some unfixable Allstar bugs, I have decided to make this into a PI. I hope you support my decision on this, and for those of you looking forward to the best Allstar, I am sorry.[/spoiler]

item.title: FizzerX [Project Insanity]
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

lol be creative man, don’t just rename overloadX

i have literally no words for this lmfao

Some of you might notice that FizzerX changed a lot. It started out as an Allstar. We are now a PI base. The reason behind that it that I was hacked a few days ago, and the hacker put a password on my FizzerX Source. The hacker has been taken care of. I have contacted the law enforcement, and got the problem solved. I tried doing everything I can to back up my source. There were 2 copies of the source. Mine, and the one Keith (a developer) had. The hacker threatened to release it to Mopar and other communities. So for that reason, and because some unfixable Allstar bugs, I have decided to make this into a PI. I hope you support my decision on this, and for those of you looking forward to the best Allstar, I am sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: FizzerX [Project Insanity]
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

me, myself, i. what?

and yes i have, their useless and don’t determine stability. all they do is establish a connection. they don’t send packets, so there not like real players and don’t provide accuracy in what your seeking. also, every ‘bot’ that logs in has a new account created (unless the account already exists).

player count/players online: loops through all existing players and increments a variable like a counter, unless you just use a list and find the maximum size. so with this in mind, it most probably will count every ‘bot’.

Read full topic

item.title: FizzerX [Project Insanity]
item.dc:creator: @FizzerX637 FizzerX637
item.description:
@FizzerX637 wrote:

Int Bauk:

well obviously if there are 700+ accounts like you said, there would be a lot more players online despite the connection delay on your little flooder. also, i’m pretty sure looping through online players wouldn’t be inaccurate. anyway, good luck again.

I was the only one online besides the SYI’s. I am still coding this, therefore nobody besides me, myself, I, and the 700+ SYI’s have an account. So that explains that.

EDIT: Have you ever used or seen a SYI flood a server and watch the player counter? Every SYI is not counted for as a real player.

Read full topic

item.title: FizzerX [Project Insanity]
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

[quote=“FizzerX637, post:15, topic:543458”][quote author=Int Bauk link=topic=662337.msg4427319#msg4427319 date=1401462821]
this server can hold over 700 syi’s at one time? well for a start your send frame packet says that there’s only 12 players online.

also, i prefer p0rn. good luck.
[/quote]

Have you ever seen a player counter go up accurately, while 700+ accounts are signing in at the same time…? I didn’t think so
thanks for your input[/quote]

well obviously if there are 700+ accounts like you said, there would be a lot more players online despite the connection delay on your little flooder. also, i’m pretty sure looping through online players wouldn’t be inaccurate. anyway, good luck again.

@Revamp, why are you crying and getting so touchy now? i never said i wouldn’t give it a chance.

Read full topic

item.title: FizzerX [Project Insanity]
item.dc:creator: @FizzerX637 FizzerX637
item.description:
@FizzerX637 wrote:

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:14, topic:543458”]this server can hold over 700 syi’s at one time? well for a start your send frame packet says that there’s only 12 players online.

also, i prefer p0rn. good luck.[/quote]

Have you ever seen a player counter go up accurately, while 700+ accounts are signing in at the same time…? I didn’t think so
thanks for your input

800 syi's is equal to like 200 real players (since real players will be doing actions which means more tasks, more queuing of packets, etc.)

aim for at least 1500 players with little to moderate lag. anything past that and you’re good to go.

if you started lagging at just 384 players… that’s really not a good sign. not sure which base you’re using, but if its project insanity there are lots of things that can be done to improve the performance. if you wanna know just pm me cause i don’t want to derail your topic.


It is an Allstar.

Read full topic

item.title: FizzerX [Project Insanity]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

FizzerX637:

EDIT: This server holds close to 800+ SYIpkpker’s.

800 syi’s is equal to like 200 real players (since real players will be doing actions which means more tasks, more queuing of packets, etc.)

aim for at least 1500 players with little to moderate lag. anything past that and you’re good to go.

if you started lagging at just 384 players… that’s really not a good sign. not sure which base you’re using, but if its project insanity there are lots of things that can be done to improve the performance. if you wanna know just pm me cause i don’t want to derail your topic.

also, what you should do is add a gateway that only allows the user to have a certain amount of sessions created at a time. also create a throttler that limits the amount of connections created in a certain time interval (ie. only 1 connection per second is allowed or the host is rejected). You’ll never have to worry about any kind of socket flooder then. Click here and here if you have no clue what I’m talking about. good luck! i like the fact that you’re keeping this old school

Read full topic
